pe.wa. 6 uposatha silaya ha keti anushasanawa sinipalle rathanawansa himi 8.30- 9.30 angunukolapalasse dipananda himi meheyawana bhawana wadasatahana 10 - 11 dharma deshanawa thanamalwila sumangala himi. 11 - 11.30 dawal sambuddha pujawa meheyawima sinipalle rathanawansa himi. 1 - 2 jathaka kathawa morayaye siwaka himi, 2 -3 kawya dharma deshanawa katharagama mahanama himi, 4 -5 bhawanawa dharmacharya ke.dab. aariyasena mahatha . 5 - 6 seth pirith deshanawa narawalpita rewatha himi athulu himiwaru 6 sil pawaranaya ha sil aluth kirima walapane wijewansa himi 7- 8.30 atawisi buddha pujawa ha aashirwada bodhi pujawa shasthrapathi angunukolapalasse dipananda himi. 8.30 - 9.30 dharma deshanawa narawalpita rewatha himi. 9.30 -5 guwanwiduli pirith deshanawa 5 - 6 sambuddha pujawa ha pansil samadan karawima wiharadhipathi sinipalle rathanawansa himi.kaluthara bodhi bharakara mandalaye meheyawimen kaluthara bodhi parishrayedi bak poda dawasa pura pinkam malawak pawathwe.poda perawaru 6.30 - 7.30 sila samadanaya ha theruwan wandanawa meheyawima panapitiye wijithananda himi, 8 -11 bhawana wadasatahana meheyawima horana mahamewuna bhawana asapuwe kalyana samuddha himi, 11.15 abhayadana pinkama pilibanda anushasanawa - gataaradawe wipuladhamma himi, paswaru 1 - 2 daham desuma nugagahalande sumanajothi himi, 2.15 - 4 daham desuma akmimana dharmapala himi, 4.35 - 5.30 daham deshanaya malegoda nanda nahimi, 5.45 - 6.45 daham desuma galthude panynyakiththi himi.maharagama siri wajiranyana dharmayathanaye wadihiti sila samadana bak poda wadasatahana meseya.
